abstract: 'It all started on the day dad came home from work and mum was gone.'
description: After her mother left, Parthena Savvidou and her father fled to Greece to live with Parthena's grandparents for six years before their eventual return to Australia. This story is about Parthena's memories of life in Greece and her special relationship with her father. A thank you from a daughter to her father.
